titles.title: I Will Lift Up My Eyes (Psalms 121)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will lift up my eyes to the mountains From where shall my help come From the Maker of earth and of heaven O Lord, Youâ€™re the keeper of my soul{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Through the day and the night You protect me from all evil When I go when I come You will guard my way You will watch over me both today And forevermore{/lang-eng}
